cases.title: Cases
cases.description: Cumulative number of confirmed or suspected cases

deaths.title: Deaths
deaths.description: Cumulative number of deaths that are suspected or confirmed to have been caused by COVID-19

typicalUsageRate.description: Typical used capacity rate for resource. This excludes any COVID usage.
